Class AdjustmentToolPanel

  • AbstractToolPanel
    • ly.img.android.pesdk.ui.panels.AdjustmentToolPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceListAdapter.OnItemClickListener<T>, SeekSlider.OnSeekBarChangeListener

    public class AdjustmentToolPanel
extends AbstractToolPanel
implements SeekSlider.OnSeekBarChangeListener, DataSourceListAdapter.OnItemClickListener<T>

    Tool view to control brightness getSettingsModel
